prompt-engineering.title: The AI Miscommunication Crisis
prompt-engineering.story:
Chapter 1: Monday Morning AI Disaster

Arjun Sharma walked into the Mumbai office ready to revolutionize marketing with AI.

He opened ChatGPT and typed: Write marketing copy

The AI gave him generic, useless text. This was going to be harder than he thought...

prompt-engineering.title: The CLEAR Framework Discovery
prompt-engineering.story:
Chapter 2: Priya's Wisdom

Priya showed Arjun the CLEAR framework for better prompts.

Context, Length, Examples, Audience, Role - the magic formula for AI success!
